commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: Another penalty! This time it's Darnell Nurse for high-sticking Sam Bennett. Florida's going back on the power play!

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: The intensity has definitely picked up. Edmonton can't seem to stay out of the box. They're playing with physicality, but it's costing them.
